text: @realDonaldTrump Thank you NY Gov. Cuomo (Dem.) for truly stepping up to the plate! YOU SHOWED THE PRESIDENT & MOST GOV'S WHAT'S NEEDED TO STOP CORONAVIRUS, INCLUDING CRITICAL TESTING.  If it wasn't for you, we'd be in deeper despair.
